* World Cup

* International Ski Federation (FIS) is the governing body for skiing and snowboarding, and it organizes and regulates various skiing and snowboarding competitions, including the World Cup.
* World Cup is a series of skiing and snowboarding competitions organized by the FIS, featuring the best athletes from around the world.

Therefore, both FIS and World Cup can be considered "Organization" entities in the context of the given paragraph.
